OpenSim::MaterialSet

MaterialSet Class Reference

#include <MaterialSet.h>

Inheritance diagram for MaterialSet:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A class for representing the list of Materials in a model It maintains a list (eventually a hashTable between names and Materials).

Author:
Ayman Habib
Version:
1.0
